src_text: Khabinete yi hlangane hi Ravunharhu, 6 Khotavuxika 2018, eUnion Buildings, Pitor Timhakankulu1.
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 6 June 2018, at the Union Buildings, Pretori Issues in the environment1.Economy Cabinet has noted the decline of 2,2% in the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the first quarter of 2018.

src_text: Ikhonomi Khabinete yi lemukile ku ya ehansi ka 2,2% eka Swimakiwa Hinkwaswo swa Tiko (GDP) eka kotara yo sungula ya 2018.
trg_text: The BIS saw the Department of Trade and Industry (the dti) approving incentive support to 103 black industrialists over the previous two financial year Forty-eight companies were also provided with market access support, eight of which are in the Eastern Cape National Minimum Wage (NMW)Cabinet welcomes the passing of the NMW Bill by the National Assembl It expresses its appreciation to all stakeholders at the National Economic Development and Labour Council for their role in reaching this agreemen This begins a process towards narrowing the wage gap, especially for the low income earner Approximately 6,4 million workers in South Africa will benefit once the Bill has been signed into la Cabinet, however, acknowledges that more work still needs to be done to close the wage disparities that still exist in the countr The Bill will now be sent to the National Council of Provinces for concurrence before the President signs it into law Basic servicesCabinet is pleased with the results of the Non-financial Census of Municipalities 2017 released by StatsS The results showed more consumers have received free basic services such as electricity, water and sanitation in 2017 as compared with 2016.

src_text: Ndzawulo ya Tinhlayohlayo ta Afrika-Dzonga (StatsSA) yi humese tinhlayo vhiki rer Vurimi, migodi na tiindasitiri to maka ti hoxile xandla eka ku ya ehansi loku eka kotara leyi yo sungul Khabinete yi nyikile xileriso eka Ntlawa wa Vaholobye va Ikhonomi ku hlangana hi ku hatlisa ku kanela hi ndlela yo yisa emahlweni hi mayelana na tinhlayo letMivuyelo ya GDP yi tisa nkongomiso lowukulu eka xidingo xa tisekitara hinkwato ta tiko ku tirhisana ku seketela ikhonomi ya le tikweni ra Afrika-Dzong Mabindzu na vatirhisi va dinga ku ya emahlweni va tirhisana na mfumo eka ku seketela mapfhumba yo tanihi Kungu ra Timhaka ta Kaye ku hlohlotela ku kula ka ikhonomi na ku tumbuluxa mitirho leyi dingiwaka swonghas Yin wana ya tiphuphukulu ta rona i Kungu ra Matirhelo ya Pholisi ya Vumaki (IPAP), leyi kongomisaka eka ku ndlandlamuxa vumaki, ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho na ku rhumeriwa ka tinhundzu ematikweni mamb Khabinete ya tshemba leswaku IPAP yi ta pfuna ku kurisa sekitara ya vumaki na ikhonomi ya hin
trg_text: Science and TechnologyCabinet notes astrological developments over the past weekend when astronomers working with the Catalina Sky Survey in Arizona, USA, discovered a small asteroid (2018 LA) near the orbit of the Moon, which hours later made contact with Eart The resultant explosion which sent waves of low-frequency sound (infrasound) rippling through the atmosphere were detected by an infrasound monitor in South Africa, which was deployed as part of the International Monitoring System of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treat This highlights the growing capability of modern sky surveys to discover asteroids targeting Earth and South Africa s internationally recognised capabilit

src_text: Eku fambeni ka lembe leri, mfumo wu ta rhurhela Samiti ya Vuvekisi ya Matiko ya Misava ku kombisa Afrika-Dzonga tanihi ndhawu ya vuvekis Xikongomelo xa xiendleko i ku tirhela ku endla mitirho ya R1,2 wa tithiriliyoni eka vuvekisi lebyintshwa eka ntlhanu wa malembe lama taka, leswi swi nga ta va na nhlohlotelo wo tivikana eka ku kula ka ikhonomi na ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho VuvekisiKhabinete yi amukela ku simekiwa ka feme yintshwa ya xiyimo xa le henhla leyi yi endlaka swimakiwa swa thekinoloji ya mahungu na vuhlanganisi eEast London eKapa-Vuxa hi ti 5 Khotavuxika 2018 hi Yekani Manufacturing, khamphani leyi hinkwayo ka yona yi nga ehansi ka vun wini bya wantim Vuvekisi lebyi bya R1 biliyoni byi ta tumbuluxa 1 000 wa mitirho ya risima yintshwa ku engetela eka nhlayo hinkwayo ya vatirhi leyi nga kona ya 450, ngopfungopfu vantshwa na vavasat Vuvekisi byi vuyeriwile kusukela eka haswimbirhi Xihlohloteri xa Switirhisiwa swa Zoni ya Ikhonomi yo Hlawuleka na Xikimi xa Vamaki va Vatima (BIS).
trg_text: The GDP results bring into sharp focus the need for all sectors of the country to work together to support South Africa s local econom Business and labour need to continue to work with government in support of initiatives such as the Nine-Point Plan to stimulate economic growth and create much-needed job One of its key pillars is the Industrial Policy Action Plan (IPAP), which focuses on increasing manufacturing, employment creation and export Cabinet is confident that the IPAP will help grow our industrial sector and economLater this year, government will host an International Investment Summit to profile South Africa as an investment destinatio The aim of the event is to work towards generating R1,2 trillion in new investments over the next five years, which will have a significant impact on economic growth and employment creation Investments Cabinet welcomes the launch of a new world-class factory that manufactures information and communications technology products in East London in the Eastern Cape on 5 June 2018 by Yekani Manufacturing, a wholly black-owned compan This R1-billion investment will create 1 000 new quality jobs in addition to the existing workforce of 450, mostly youth and womeThis investment has benefited from both the Special Economic Zone Infrastructure Incentive and the Black Industrialist Scheme (BIS).

src_text: BIS yi endle leswaku Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki (dti) yi pasisa nseketelo wa xihlohloteri eka 103 wa vamaki va vantima eka malembeximali mambirhi lama nga hundz Makumemunenhungu wa tikhamphani ti tlhele ti nyikiwa nseketelo wo fikelela timakete, nhungu wa tona ti le Kapa-Vux 3.
trg_text: Cabinet approved for the submission of the 2016/17 report on the performance of the Research and Development (R&D) Tax-Incentive Programme to Parliamen The incentive programme has enabled companies to diversify their R&D portfolio, generate intellectual property and create new product The incentive programme, which was introduced in November 2006, is being implemented by the Department of Science and Technology together with the South African Revenue Service and National Treasur From March 2016 to February 2017, a total of 153 R&D tax-incentive applications were received from 117 companies, 58 of which were first-time applicant The applications were for 571 R&D projects worth an estimated R3,6 billio Cabinet is pleased with the growth in the number of companies that invest in R&D and continues to call on business to invest more in R&D, which remains an important pillar of our efforts to grow the econom 15.

src_text: Muholo wa Mpimohansi wa Rixaka (NMW)Khabinete yi amukela ku pasisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa NMW hi Huvo ya Rixak Yi hundzisa ku khensa ka yona eka vakhomaxiave hinkwavo eka Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi wa Rixaka na Huvo ya Vatirhi eka xiave xa vona eka ku fikelela ntwanano low Leswi swi sungula endlelo ro yisa eka ku hunguta vangwa ra miholo, ngopfungopfu eka vaholi va malinghena ya le hans Kwalomu ka 6,4 wa timiliyoni ta vatirhi eAfrika-Dzonga va ta vuyeriwa xikan wekan we loko Nawumbisi lowu se wu sayiniwile ku va naw Hambiswiritano, Khabinete ya amukela leswaku swo tala swa ha dinga ku endliwa ku pfala ku hambana ka mihlolo loku ka ha riki kona etikwen Nawumbisi lowu sweswi wu ta rhumeriwa eka Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzakulu ku ya pfumeleriwa loko Phuresidente a nga si wu sayini ku va nawu Vukorhokeri bya masunguloKhabinete ya tsaka hi mivuyelo ya Nhlayelo wa Vanhu lowu nga riki wa swa Timali wa Timasipala wa 2017 lowu humesiweke hi StatsS Mivuyelo yi kombe leswaku vatirhisi vo tala va kumile vukorhokeri bya masungulo bya mahala byo tanihi gezi, mati na mbhasiso hi 2017 loko ku fananisiwa na 2016.
trg_text: North WestCabinet received a third progress report from the Inter-Ministerial Task Team (IMTT) on North Wes Cabinet is satisfied with the progress made to operationalise the invoked Section 100(1) (a) and (b) in the North West provincial department It was further approved that the IMTT will onwards report to Cabinet once a month to enable the teams deployed in the province to continue with the worCabinet endorsed a visit to the North West on 7 June 2018 to brief the North West Executive, Provincial Legislature and the external auditors responsible for the province Protest action Cabinet condemns the recent violent protests around the country, and is especially saddened by the acts of violence and intimidation of patients and medical staff at the Charlotte Maxeke Johannesburg Academic Hospita Protestors who exercise their rights to protest should do so without violating the rights of others, particularly the vulnerabl No amount of grievance justifies violence and the threatening behaviour seen in the past week Safety and securityCabinet welcomes and supports the

src_text: Mfumo wu tama wa ha tibohile eka ku nyika vukorhokeri bya masungulo bya siku na siku eka vaakatiko va wona hinkwavo, ngopfungopfu vanhu lava swelek Phurojeke leyi fambelanaka na mati leya ha ku vaka kona i Phurojeke ya Mati ya Mhlathuze ya R96 wa timiliyoni eRichards Bay eKwaZulu-Natal, leyi yi nga ta phakela mati yo nwa ya tiphayiphi eka kutlula 6 000 wa mindyang 5.
trg_text: Government remains committed to providing daily basic services to all its citizens, especially poor peopl The most recent water-related project is the R96-million Mhlathuze Water Project in Richards Bay in KwaZulu-Natal, which will deliver running tap water to more than 6 000 households Public Service wage negotiationsCabinet received a briefing from the Minister of Public Service and Administration on the Public Service wage negotiation Cabinet appreciates the commitment by all stakeholders in finding an amicable solution that would benefit all role player Cabinet reaffirms government s commitment to fully engage with labour so as to arrive at a workable deal for all involved Social grants Cabinet reassures beneficiaries of social grants that government will continue providing this important service, as mandated by the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Mikanerisano ya miholo ya VutirhelamfumoKhabinete yi kumile vuxokoxoko kusuka eka Holobye wa Vutirhelamfumo na Vulawuri eka mikanerisano ya miholo ya Vutirhelamfum Khabinete yi khensa ku tiboha ka vakhomaxiave hinkwavo eka ku kuma xitshunxo xa kahle lexi xi nga ta vuyerisa vatirhi va swiave hinkwav Khabinete yi tiyisisa hi vuntshwa ku tiboha ka mfumo ku vulavurisana hi vutalo na vatirhi ku endlela ku fikelela ntwanano wo tirheka wa lava khumbekaka hinkwavo Timali ta Nhlayiso wa VaakiKhabinete yi tshembisa vavuyeriwa va timali ta nhlayiso wa vaaki leswaku mfumo wu ta ya emahlweni wu nyika vukorhokeri lebyi bya nkoka, tanihilaha wu nyikiweke xileriso hakona hi Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga ya 1996.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the National Health Insurance (NHI) Bill of 2018 to be published in the Government Gazette for public commen The Bill seeks to establish the NHI Fund of South Africa, as a public entity, so as to provide for a sustained universal health access that is affordable and of high qualit It also sets out its functions, powers and dutieThe Bill provides a framework for the active purchasing of healthcare services by the fund on behalf of users and creates mechanisms for the equitable, effective and efficient use of the resources of the fund to meet the health needs of user The Minister of Health will next week hold a full media briefing to unpack this Bil Cabinet approved for the introduction of the Science and Technology Laws Amendment Bill of 2017 to Parliamen The Bill harmonizes the provisions which regulate the operations and governance of the public entities that report to the Minister of Science and Technolog This will ensure consistency in all requirements to be met and processes to be followe

src_text: Timali ta nhlayiso wa vaaki ti ta ya emahlweni ti holeriwa naswona endlelo ra ku siva khadi lera khale ra Ejensi ya Timali ta Nhlayiso wa Vaaki ya Afrika-Dzonga (SASSA) hi lerintshwa ri ta ya emahlweni kufikela hi ku hela ka Ndzati 2018.Xinakulobye exikarhi ka SASSA na Hofisi ya Poso ya Afrika-Dzonga xi nyika mivuyelo leyinene tanihileswi vavuyeriwa vo tala kusukela hi Mudyaxihi 2018 va nga eku yeni ku ya Cincisa makhadi ya vonKhabinete yi khutaza miganga ku honisa swihungwana swo koma leswi lerisaka vavuyeriwa va timali ta nhlayiso wa vaaki ku tsarisa hi vuntshwa ku kuma timali ta vona ta nhlayiso wa vaaki ku papalata ku ka va nga holeriw Swihungwana leswo lahlekisa swo tano swi lava ku vanga mpfilupfilu exikarhi ka lava sweleke na ku hambukisa mfumo eka ku tiyisisa leswaku timali ta nhlayiso wa vaaki ta hakeriwa handle ka swihoxo eka vavuyeriwa ku ri hava nhlulek
trg_text: The partnership between SASSA and the South African Post Office is yielding positive results as more beneficiaries have since May 2018 been coming forward to swap their cardCabinet urges communities to ignore recent short messages directing social-grant beneficiaries to re-register for their social grants to avoid not being pai Such misleading messages seek to create confusion amongst the poor and derail government from ensuring that social grants are seamlessly paid to beneficiaries without failur 7.

src_text: N walungu-VupeladyambuKhabinete yi kume xiviko xa ndzima leyi khatsiweke xa vunharhu kusuka eka Xipano xa Ntirho xa Vaholobye va Tindzawulo to Hambana (IMTT) eN walungu-Vupeladyamb Khabinete yi enerisekile hi ndzima leyi khatsiweke ku tirhisa Xiyenge xa 100(1) (a) na (b) lexi tlhontlhiweke eka tindzawulo ta xifundzakulu ta N walungu-Vupeladyamb Ku tlhele ku yiwa emahlweni ku pasisiwa leswaku IMTT kuya emahlweni yi ta vikela Khabinete kan we hi n hweti ku kotisa swipano leswi rhumeriweke eka xifundzakulu lexi ku ya emahlweni na ntirhKhabinete yi pfumelele vuendzi kuya eN walungu-Vupeladyambu hi ti 7 Khotavuxika 2018 ku ya nyika vuxokoxoko eka Vurhangerinkulu bya N walungu-Vupeladyambu, Huvo yo Endla Milawu ya Xifundzakulu na vakambatinkota lava nga na vutihlamuleri bya xifundzakul 8.
trg_text: Group of Seven (G7) SummitCabinet welcomes South Africa s invitation to attend the upcoming G7 Summit in Canad South Africa participated in the summit seven years ago and this invitation is an indication of renewed confidence in the South African econom Our government will seek to use the opportunity to invite investors to inject capital into our econom Investment is necessary for economic growth and job creation on a scale that will significantly reduce current levels of unemploymen South Africa-India 125 Years Anniversary Event As part of the Nelson Mandela and Albertina Sisulu centenary celebrations, Cabinet welcomes the commemoration on 7 June 2018 of Mahatma Gandhi s removal from a train at Pietermaritzburg Station 125 years ag This event spurred Gandhi s philosophy of Satyagraha (truth-force), which had a significant influence on our political leadership and contributed to our liberation struggl 22.

src_text: Xiendlo xa ku kombisa ku vilela Khabinete yi sole mikombiso ya ku vilela leya ha ku vaka kona etikweni hinkwaro, naswona yi vilerisiwa ngopfungopfu hi swiendlo swa madzolonga na ku chavisiwa ka vavabyi na vatirhi va swa vutshunguri eka Xibedhlele xa Xiakhademiki xa Joni xa Charlotte Maxek Vakombisa ku vilela lava va tirhisaka timfanelo ta vona ku kombisa ku vilela va fanele ku endla tano handle ko onha timfanelo ta van wana, ngopfungopfu lava nga sirhelelekangik Ku hava mpimo wa xirilo lowu nga faneriwaka hi madzolonga na matikhomelo ya nchavisano lama voniweke evhikini leri nga hundza Vuhlayiseki na nsirheleloKhabinete yi amukela na ku seketela
trg_text: The reviewing process seeks to ensure that diversion service providers and diversion programmes are at all times compliant with the minimum standard Six of the chapters have been amended to improve the quality and standards of services provided to children found in conflict with the la Cabinet approved the Regional Engagement Strategy for Biosafety and its implementatio Biotechnology is recognised as an important potential driver of economic growth and a major tool in the fight against hunger and poverty, especially in developing countrie This strategy will facilitate intra-African trade and improve the region s competitiveness in global market It will improve South Africa s collaboration and cooperation within the African regio

trg_text: Cabinet appeals to members of the public to use the Crime Stop line responsibl An abuse of this facility may affect a legitimate emergency call that may have saved a lif 10.

src_text: N hweti ya Vantshwa Khabinete yi khutaza MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku tirha xiphemu xa vona eka minongonoko ya havexerisomatimba wa vantshwa na tiphurojeke hi nkarhi wa N hweti ya Vantshwa hi Khotavuxik Nan waka i lembexidzana ra Tatana Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela na Manana Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu na N hweti ya Vantshwa 2018 swa seketeriwa ehansi ka nkongomelo:
trg_text: Youth Month Cabinet urges all South Africans to play their part in youth-empowerment programmes and projects during Youth Month in Jun This year is the centenary of Tata Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela and Mama Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu and Youth Month 2018 is embraced under the theme:

src_text: Hanya Ndzhaka: Ku yisa eka vantshwa lava havexerisiweke matimba hi ndlela ikhonomi ya vaaki .
trg_text: Live the legacy: Towards a socio-economically empowered youth .Inspired by their iconic legacies, young people need to be empowered to take up a more active role in developing their communities with a view to working together to develop South Afric Government is working hard to ensure that youth are able to access the many support and educational government programmes that would enhance their participation in the econom 11.

src_text: Va ri karhi va hlohloteriwa hi tindzhaka ta tinghwazi ta vona, vanhu lavatsongo va dinga ku havexerisiwa matimba ku teka xiave xo gingiriteka swinene eka ku hluvukisa miganga ya ka vona hi xikongomelo xa ku tirhisana ku hluvukisa Afrika-Dzong Mfumo wu le ku tirheni hi matimba ku tiyisisa leswaku vantshwa va kota ku fikelela minongonoko ya mfumo yo tala ya nseketelo na dyondzo leyi yi nga ta antswisa vutekaxiave xa vona eka ikhonom Swikambelo swa masungulo na swa le xikarhi ka lembeKhabinete yi rhamba vatswari na vahlayisi ku seketela, endzeni ka tindlela leti faneleke, vana lava va tsalaka swikambelo swa masungulo na swa le xikarhi ka lembe leswi nga eku endlekeni etikweni hinkwarKhabinete yi amukela hi ku tsaka ntirho wa nkoka swonghasi wa vahlayisi va vana lowu va wu tirhaka eka ku vumba varhangeri va hina va mundzuk Loko va ri karhi va endla mivangu leyi tirhekaka na ku va leyi hlayisekeke eka vana va hina ku va va dyondzNakambe Khabinete yi amukela ku pfuriwa hi vuntshwa ka swikolo etindhawini to hambanahambana ta N walungu-Vupeladyambu, ku katsa na Koster na Rustenbur Leswi swi ta endzhaku ka mavhiki ya mikombiso ya ku vilela na mikavanyeto eka ku dyondzisa na ku dyondza etindhawini let Khabinete yi khutaze vatswari, vadyondzi na vadyondzisi ku tirhisana eka ku ringeta ku pfala nkarhi lowu lahlekeke na ku tiboha hi vutalo eka minongonoko yo hlongoris Dyandza na ritshwaKhabinete yi tsundzuxa MaAfrika-Dzonga leswaku tiko ri le ku hlanganeni na dyandz Afrika-Dzonga i rin wana ra matiko yo oma ngopfu ya 30 emisaveni naswona manelo ya timpfula ya le hansi ka ntolovelo ya nyanyisile xiyim Vanhu hinkwavo va fanele va ya emahlweni va tirhisana na mfumo ku hlayisa mati ku endlela leswaku ku va na mphakelo wo ringanela wa hinkwavLoko hi ri karhi hi nghena eka nguva ya vuxika, Khabinete yi rhamba vaakandhawu ku tihlayisa swinene ku sivela ritshwa ra mikhukhu na nhov Mfumo wu ya emahlweni wu tirha na vaakandhawu ku kondletela magoza ya vuhlayiseki hi nkarhi lowu loko vo tala va tirhisa mixaka yo hambanahambana ya swipfurhisi na swihisisi ku tikufumet
trg_text: Preliminary and mid-term examsCabinet calls on parents and guardians to support, within necessary means, children who are writing preliminary and mid-term examinations taking place across the countr Cabinet warmly appreciates the vital role child caregivers play in shaping our future leaders whilst creating conducive and safe environments for our children to lear We also encourage all learners to continue studying and striving to do their besCabinet also welcomes the reopening of schools in various parts of North West, including Koster and Rustenbur This comes after weeks of protests and disruptions in teaching and learning in the area Cabinet urges parents, learners and teachers to collaborate in trying to recover the lost time and fully commit to catch-up programme Drought and fireCabinet reminds South Africans that the country is still experiencing drough South Africa is one of the 30-driest countries in the world and the lower-than-normal rainfalls have worsened the situatio All people must continue partnering with government to conserve water so as to ensure there is sufficient supply for al As we enter the winter season, Cabinet calls on communities to take extra care to prevent shack and veld fire Government continues to work with communities to promote safety measures at this time when many use various forms of fuel and heating to keep war

src_text: Sayense na ThekinolojiKhabinete yi tekela enhlokweni leswa ha ku humelelaka eka ntivotinyeleti emahelweni ya vhiki lama nga hundza loko vativatinyeleti lava tirhaka eka Mbalango wa Xibakabaka wa Catalina eArizona, USA, laha ku thumbiweke asiteroyidi (xipulanetana) lexitsongo (LA ya 2018) ekusuhi na ndzhendzeleko wa N weti, leyi endzhaku ka tiawara yi hlanganeke na MisavMbhuluko lowu vangekeke lowu rhumeleke magandlati ya mpfumawulo wa le hansi (mpfumawulo wa le hansihansi) lama fambafambaka exibakabakeni ya thumbhiwile hi xilanguteri xa mpfumawulo wa le hansihansi eAfrika-Dzonga, lexi a xi rhumeriwile tanihi xiphemu xa Sisiteme ya Vulanguteri bya Matiko ya Misava ya Ntwanano wa Yiriso wo Ringeta Nyutliliya wo Angarhel Leswi swi kombisa vuswikoti lebyi kulaka bya mivalango ya xibakabaka ya ximanguvalawa ku thumba tiasiteroyidi leti pakanisaka Misava na vuswikoti lebyi tekeriwaka enhlokweni misava hinkwayo bya Afrika-Dzong Swiboho swa Khabinete14.
trg_text: Condolences2 Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in sending heartfelt condolences to the family and friends of the five boys who died in a blaze at the Masiya informal settlement in Philippi, Cape TowThe fire also displaced 30 residents of the informal settlemen Government is working hard to ensure that there is housing, security and comfort for all South African Congratulations2 Cabinet wishes African National Congress veteran Baba Andrew Mokete Mlangeni a happy belated birthda Baba Mlangeni celebrated his 93rd birthday on Wednesday, 6 June 2018.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku rhumeriwa ka xiviko 2016/17 hi matirhelo ya Nongonoko wa Xihlohloteri xa Xibalo (Ndzavisiso na Nhluvukiso (R&D)) ePalamend Nongonoko wa xihlohloteri wu kotisile tikhamphani ku hambanisa photifoliyo ya tona ya R&D, ku endla nhundzu ya vutumbuluxi na ku tumbuluxa swimakiwa leswintshw Nongonoko wa xihlohloteri, lowu wu sunguriweke hi Hukuri 2006, wu le ku tirhisiweni hi Ndzawulo ya Sayense na Thekinoloji swin we na Vukorhokeri bya Xibalo bya Afrika-Dzonga na Nkwama wa Timali wa TikKusuka hi Nyenyankulu 2016 kufika Nyenyanyana 2017, ntsengo wa 153 wa swikombelo swa xihlohloteri xa xibalo xa R&D wu kumekile kusuka eka 117 wa tikhamphani, 58 ta tona a ti ri vakomberi rosungul Swikombelo leswi a swi ri swa 571 ya tiphurojeke ta R&D leti nga na nkoka lowu kumbeteriwaka ku va R3,6 wa tibiliyon Khabinete yi tsakisiwa hi ku kula eka nhlayo ya tikhamphani leti ti vekisaka eka R&D naswona yi ya emahlweni yi rhamba mabindzu ku vekisa swinene eka R&D, leswi swi tamaka swa ha ri phuphu ya nkoka eka matshalatshala ya hina ya ku kurisa ikhonom Khabinete yi pasise ku kandziyisiwa ka mbalango wa 2017/18 eka ku nyikiwa ka timali ka mfumo eka Migingiriko ya Sayense na Thekinoloj Mbalango lowu lembe na lembe wu veka tihlo eka matirhelo ya sekitara ya sayense na thekinoloji, ku hoxa ka yona xandla eka ku kula na nhluvukiso wa Afrika-Dzong Khabinete yi lemuke swikamanyeto swa mipimanyeto leswi swi vangeke ku kula ko nonoka eka matirhiselo ya timali ya R&D eka tindzawulo hinkwat
trg_text: Player of the Year award It has been a remarkable year for young Rabada who among other achievements, rose to the No 1 bowling ranking in the world in Test match cricke He is currently the leading wicket-taker for 2018 and also ranked No 7 in One Day International cricke 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Siya Kolisi as the first black captain of the Springbok team for the three match test series against Englan We are confident that he will do South Africa proud as our captain, and will inspire others by his actions and leadership on and off the field of pla 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Finance Minister Nhlanhla Nene as Chairperson of the New Development Bank (NDB) Board of Governor The NDB is a multilateral development bank established by Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa (BRICS) in 2014.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise Rimba ra Pholisi ra ku Nyikiwa ka Mpfumelelo ka Vukorhokeri bya Vuhambanisi eAfrika-Dzonga leri kambisisiwek Rimba lera pholisi ri tumbuluxiwile hi 2010 hi ku fambisana na Nawu wa Vululami bya Vana, 2008 (Nawu wa 75 wa 2008).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the reviewed Policy Framework for Accreditation of Diversion Services in South Afric The policy framework was put in place in 2010 in line with the Child Justice Act, 2008 (Act 75 of 2008).

src_text: Endlelo lero kambisisa ri lava ku tiyisisa leswaku vaphakeri va vukorhokeri bya vuhambanisi na minongonoko ya vuhambanisi mikarhi hinkwayo yi landzelela milawu hi mpimo ya mpimohans Tsevu wa mikavanyiso yi hundzuluxiwile ku antswisa risima na mipimo ya vukorhokeri lebyi nyikiwaka vana lava kumekaka va ri edzolongeni na naw
trg_text: It is mandated to mobilise resources for infrastructure and sustainable development projects in BRICS and other emerging economies and developing countries, complementing the efforts of multilateral and regional financial institutions for global growth and developmen AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearanc Reappointment of Mr Ebrahim Mohamed as the Commissioner of the National Consumer Commissio

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise Qhinga ra Mbulavurisano wa Swifundza eka Vuhlayiseki bya Swihanyi na ntirhiso wa ron Bayothekinoloji yi tekeriwile enhlokweni tanihi xilawuri lexi nga na vuswikoti xa nkoka xa ku kula ka ikhonomi na xitirhokulu eka ku lwisana na ndlala na vusweti, ngopfungopfu ematikweni lama ha hluvukak Qhinga leri ri ta humelerisa mabindzu exikarhi ka matiko ya Afrika na ku antswisa vuphikizani bya xifundza etimakete ta misava hinkway Ri ta antswisa ntirhisano wa Afrika-Dzonga endzeni ka xifundza xa Afrik Nawumbisi18.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the 2016/17 survey on government funding for Scientific and Technological Activitie The survey annually monitors the performance of the science and technology sector, and its contribution to South Africa s growth and developmen Cabinet has noted the budget constraints that have resulted in slow growth in R&D expenditure across department

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise Nawumbisi wa Ndzindzakhombo wa Rihanyu wa Rixaka (NHI) wa 2018 ku va wu kandziyisiwa eka Gazete ya Mfumo leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonel Nawumbisi lowu wu lava ku tumbuluxa Nkwama wa NHI wa Afrika-Dzonga, tanihi vandla ra mfumo, ku endlela ku lulamisela mifikelelo wa swa rihanyu ra vanhu hinkwavo lowu yisekaka emahlweni lowu wu fikelelekaka na ku va wa risima ra le henhl Nakambe wu hlamusela mitirho, matimba na vutihlamuleri bya wonNawumbisi wu nyika rimba ra ku xaviwa ka mafulufulu ka vukorhokeri bya nhlayiso wa swa rihanyu hi nkwama hi ku yimela vatirhisi naswona wu tumbuluxa maendlelo ya ntirhiso wo ringana, lowu vuyerisaka na ku va lowu nga tlangisiki wa swipfuno swa nkwama ku fikelela swidingo swa rihanyu swa vatirh Holobye wa Rihanyu vhiki leri taka u ta khoma nhlengeletano yo nyika vuxokoxoko ya swihangalasamahungu hi vutalo ku tlhantlha Nawumbisi low Khabinete yi pasise ku andlariwa ka Nawumbisi wa Ndzhundzhuluxo wa Milawu ya Sayense na Thekinoloji wa 2017 ePalamend Nawumbisi wu fambelanisa malulamiselo lama nga ta lawula matirhelo na mafumelo ya mavandla ya mfumo lama vikaka eka Holobye wa Sayense na Thekinoloj Leswi swi ta tiyisisa leswaku ku na mfanano eka swilaveko leswi faneleke ku fikeleriwa na maendlelo lama faneleke ku landzeleriw

src_text: Samiti ya Ntlawa wa Nkombo (G7)Khabinete yi amukela xirhambo xa Afrika-Dzonga ku ya eka Samiti ya G7 leyi taka eCanad Afrika-Dzonga yi teke xiave eka samiti leyi nkombo wa malembe lama nga hundza naswona xirhambo lexi i xikombo xa vutitshembi lebyi pfuxeleriweke eka ikhonomi ya Afrika-DzongMfumo wa hina wu lava ku tirhisa xivandlanene lexi ku rhamba vavekisi ku nghenisa xumakulu eka ikhonom Vuvekisi i bya nkoka swonghasi eka ku kula ka ikhonomi na ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho hi xikalo lexi xi nga ta hunguta hi ndlela yo tivikana tilevhele ta nkarhi wa sweswi ta vupfulalantirh Xiendleko xa Anivhesari xa Malembe ya 125 ya Afrika-Dzonga-IndiaTanihi xiphemu xa ku tlangeriwa ka malembexidzana ya Nelson Mandela na Albertina Sisulu, Khabinete yi amukela ku tsundzukiwa hi siku ra 7 Khotavuxika 2018 ra ku chichiwa ka Mahatma Gandhi exitimeleni eka Xitichi xa Pietermaritzburg 125 wa malembe lama nga hundz Xiendleko lexi xi hlanganyete filosofi ya Gandhi ya Satyagraha (ku tiarisa ka nkamadzolonga), leyi yi veke na nhlohlotelo eka vurhangeri bya hina bya xipolitiki naswona yi hoxe xandla eka nyimpi ya hina ya ntshunxek Vuendzeri bya Mfumo bya Saharawi Arab Democratic RepublicPhuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa u rhurhele ntangha yakwe hi ntirho wa Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic, Brahim Ghali, hi ti 4 Khotavuxika 2018 hi nkarhi wa Vuendzeri bya Mfumo etikwen Khabinete yi hundzisa nkhomano wa yona na vanhu va Saharawi eka ku lwela ka vona vutifumi naswona yi rhamba matiko ya misava ku nyika nseketelo lowu faneleke eka vanhu va Saharaw Mahungu23.
trg_text: Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic State VisitPresident Cyril Ramaphosa hosted his Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic counterpart, Brahim Ghali, on 4 June 2018 during a State Visit to the countrCabinet expresses its solidarity with the people of Saharawi in their fight for independence and calls on the international community to provide the necessary support to the people of Saharaw Messages23.

src_text: Michavelelo2 Khabinete yi tikatse na Phuresidente Ramaphosa eka ku rhumela michavelelo yo huma embilweni eka ndyangu na vanghana va ntlhanu wa vafana lava va loveke eka langavi eswidakanini swa Masiya ePhilippi, KapNakambe ndzilo lowu wu rhurhise 30 wa vatshami va le swidakanini lesw Mfumo wu le ku tirheni hi matimba ku tiyisisa leswaku ku na tindlu, nsirhelelo na ntshamiseko wa MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwav Vuhoyozeri2 Khabinete yi navelela nghwazi ya African National Congress Tatana Andrew Mokete Mlangeni siku ra ku velekiwa leri hundzeke ra ntsak Tatana Mlangeni u tlangerile siku yena ra ku velekiwa ra vu93 hi Ravunharhu, 6 Khotavuxika 2018.
trg_text: He was among the first to be sent for military training outside South Africa and after being arrested on his return, he was found guilty and sentenced to life imprisonment on Robben IslandCabinet congratulates Proteas fast bowler Kagiso

src_text: A ri exikarhi ka lavo sungula ku yisiwa eka vuleteri bya vusocha ehandle ka Afrika-Dzonga naswona endzhaku ka ku khomiwa loko a vuyile, u voniwile nandzu kutani a gweviwa ku ya tshama ekhotsweni vutomi bya yena hinkwabyo eka Xihlala xa RobbenKhabinete yi hoyozela mubawuli wo hatlisa wa Proteas Kagiso
trg_text: Rabada, who stole the show at the Cricket South Africa Awards held recently in Sandton, Gauten

src_text: Rabada, loyi a yiveke rinoko eka Masagwati ya Afrika-Dzonga ya Khirikhete lama a ya khomiwe ku nga ri khale eSandton, Gauten U tekeriwile enhlokweni hi tsevu wa masagwati, ku katsa na masagwati ya Mutlangi wa Khirikhete na Mutlangi wa Lembe wa Vatlang Ri vile lembe ro bumabumeleke ra Rabada lontsongo loyi exikarhi ka mifikelelo yin wana, a tlakukeke kufika eka ntlawahato wo bawula wa Nomboro 1 emisaveni eka khirikhete ya meche wo Ringet Eka nkarhi wa sweswi i muteki wa tiwikete loyi a rhangeleke wa 2018 naswona u tlhela ntlawahatiwa eka Nomboro 7 eka khirikhete ya matiko ya misava ya Siku Rin weKhabinete yi amukela ku thoriwa ka Siya Kolisi tanihi kapiteni ya wantima wo sungula wa xipano xa Springbok eka ntlhandlamano wo ringeta wa mimeche yinharhu ehenhla ka Nghilandh Ha tshemba leswaku u ta endla Afrika-Dzonga yi tinyungubyisa tanihi kapiteni ya hina, naswona u ta hlohlotela van wana hi swiendlo na vurhangeri bya yena endzeni na le handle ka rivala ra tlanguKhabinete yi amukela ku thoriwa ka Holobye wa Timali Nhlanhla Nene tanihi Mutshamaxitulu wa Huvo ya Vagavhenara va Bangi ya Nhluvukiso Leyintshwa (NDB).
